nodes.text: KL-03, or K-L, was an admin unit and protocol droid owned by the former Jedi Ty Yorrick, who worked as a saber-for-hire during the High Republic Era. Like her other possessions, such as her astromech droid R0-VR and starship, Yorrick did not see a point in naming the admin unit, seeing the droid as a tool that she did not need to become attached to. KL-03 was sarcastic and frequently chided Yorrick for being more machine than she was.

KL-03 was created by Cavan Scott as part of the Star Wars: The High Republic publishing initiative. The droid was introduced in Ty Yorrick's Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic video on April 15, 2021 and was subsequently identified in the novel The High Republic: The Rising Storm, written by Scott and published on June 29, 2021. The admin unit's design was inspired by concept art created by Matthew Savage for L3-37 in Solo: A Star Wars Story.
